Package il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1

Class LanguageCheckFactory

java.lang.Object
il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1.LanguageCheckFactory
public class LanguageCheckFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Factory for LanguageCheck implementations. To register an implementation, the register() function must be called. This can be done from the registerAll() function (by editing it).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck
    A command for generating a LanguageCheck implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck> generators
    This map maps language names to commands that generate the appropriate LanguageCheck implementation instance.
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​LanguageCheck> instances
    When generating an instance of a LanguageCheck, it will be stored here for future use.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor Description
    LanguageCheckFactory()

    static LanguageCheck getCheckFor​(java.lang.String language)
    This function retrieves the registered check for the given language.

  • Field Details

    • generators

      private static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck> generators
      This map maps language names to commands that generate the appropriate LanguageCheck implementation instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • LanguageCheckFactory

      public LanguageCheckFactory()

  • Method Details

    • register

      public static void register​(java.lang.String language, LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck generator)
      This function has to be called in order to register an implementation. The parameters are the language to check for, and an object of type LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck which is capable of generating an instance of the implementation on calling execute().
      Parameters:
      language - the language to check for.
      generator - a command that generates the implementation.

    • getCheckFor

      public static LanguageCheck getCheckFor​(java.lang.String language)
      This function retrieves the registered check for the given language.
      Parameters:
      language - that a checker for is required.
      Returns:
      a checker for language.
      Throws:
      InvalidCommandException - thrown if no LanguageCheck implementation is registered for language.
